description: Led and planned the development of a scalable mobile and web application with Flutter support iOS and Android devices. description: Co-founded a startup with a mission to empower developers by streamlining access to a diverse range of Large Language Models (LLMs) and fostering innovation in AI-driven applications. Designed and managed our SQLite database architecture, focusing on schema maintenance, query optimization, and seamless data migrations. Led the development of a comprehensive, user-friendly dashboard featuring secure user authentication, API key management, and detailed usage data, all aimed at providing a robust and intuitive experience for our users.
responsibilities: Collaborated with designers to implement UI/UX improvements
Integrated with backend APIs for data fetching

description: Seamlessly integrated Nuula's core features with analytics using GraphQL and Spring Boot, delivering a substantial increase in user app data for the BI Team's insightful analysis of trends and potential risks. responsibilities: Wrote Python scripts for data analysis

description: Taught Indigenous youth by delivering engaging lessons and adapting teaching methods to provide accessible education to students facing systemic barriers.
